description: Alcatraz AI transforms access control by leveraging artificial intelligence and analytics to make powerful decisions at the edge, where your face becomes your credential.
Aldeamo allows its customers to reach consumers on any type of mobile phone without having to use any mobile data, by using SMS, email verification, push notifications, Whatsapp and voicemail.
Alegra is an invoicing and accounting software designed for managers of small businesses.

Algo Consulting Group is an international business and technology services and solutions provider that helps companies large and small optimize organizational performance by mapping strategic goals and objectives to IT initiatives.
Alice is a primary healthcare provider and direct-to-consumer health insurer in Brazil.
Alissar is one of MENA’s leading floral solutions providers.
Alivio Capital is a non-bank financial institution that provides consumer loans for patients in need of healthcare services.
Alltournative combines sustainable adventure tourism with indigenous culture in Cancun and the Mayan Riviera.
AlMouneer operates diabetic retina centers to improve the quality of life for patients with diabetes.
AloTech offers cloud-based, “pay-as-you-go” call center solutions as opposed to traditional, on-premise, capital-intensive products.
Altibbi is an interactive online Arabic health portal, providing users with direct access to information from health professionals in a convenient, user-friendly, confidential, and timely manner.
ALTO focuses on the prevention and reduction of capital losses in any type of industry, integrating data, analysis and insights to drive actions that generate operational efficiency.

AMARO is a digitally native vertical direct-to-consumer brand that sells high-quality apparel, footwear, and accessories at fair prices, leveraging data and technology to dis-intermediate the high markup wholesale/resale model and providing customers with a superior brand and product experience.
Ambar is Brazilian provider of modular housing solutions intended to minimize the cost of housing.
Andiago! is a modern marketplace of extraordinary restaurant experiences in cities around the world.
Angelus provides dental solutions with a scientific and technological basis.

Anghami is the leading digital music service in the Middle East, offering music enthusiasts the opportunity to listen to a wide variety of Arabic and English tracks from the convenience of a mobile phone. Anghami went public on the NASDAQ via SPAC in 2021.
Antara provides mining companies with software to track the inventory, quality and location of their products from initial exploration to delivery at port.
Through its cutting edge hardware and software technology solutions, Antelope Audio ensures high quality audio across a number of specialized markets in the music production industry.
Apollo Agriculture is a platform designed to help farmers with modern farming in emerging markets.
